Class ExpenseReportSubject

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.common.observer.impl.ExpenseReportSubject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class ExpenseReportSubject extends Object implements Subject
Concrete implementation of the Subject interface for managing observers interested in ExpenseReportRequest updates.

Maintains a list of observers and notifies them whenever a new expense report request is set.

Usage example: 

 ExpenseReportSubject subject = new ExpenseReportSubject();
 subject.attach(new SomeObserverImplementation());
 subject.setRequest(new ExpenseReportRequest(...));

See Also:

  • Observer
  • ExpenseReportRequest

    Notifies all attached observers by calling their report method with the current expense report request.

    Sets the current ExpenseReportRequest and notifies all observers about this update.
